titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Elizabeth Feldhusen records on the Brooklyn Park Advisory Committee 1988.050
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:09:58 +0000.

did.unittitle: Elizabeth Feldhusen records on the Brooklyn Park Advisory Committee

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Brooklyn Park Advisory Committee (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.)

did.abstract: The collection includes reports, studies, proposals, minutes, agendas, and letters covering the participation of Elizabeth Feldhusen in the Brooklyn Park Advisory Committee, specifically pertaining to the improvement of Prospect Park.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Elizabeth Feldhusen records on the Brooklyn Park Advisory Committee, 1988.050, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
